name: LiteStream
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Paired with Amazon Alexa, Lite Stream gives users the ability to turn on/off lights, change dimming level, and change color temperature all through voice. 

To connect Alexa to Lite Stream simply follow the instructions below:

1 ) Download and install the Lite Stream app on your android or IOS device
2 ) Register to Lite Stream using your email or phone number
3 ) Connect your smart devices to Lite Stream (detailed instructions on how to use the app can be found at www.LTFtechnology.com)
4 ) Give your lighting devices suitable names for easy voice identification
5 ) If you are trying to control Bluetooth devices through Alexa, make sure you have also connected a Bluetooth gateway to Lite Stream
6 ) Go to the Amazon Alexa app and enable the Lite Stream skill
7 ) You will be redirected to a log in page where you must log in and give Amazon Alexa authorization to complete the pairing process

Try controlling your plugs with these phrases:
"Alexa, turn on smart plug"
"Alexa, turn off smart plug"

If your lighting devices are color tunable, you can change color temperature by saying:

"Alexa, change smart light to warm"
Alexa, change smart light to cool"
